00024 void write_ppm(const char* filename, int width, int height, unsigned char * buf)
00025 {
00026     FILE * ppmfile;
00027 
00028     ppmfile = fopen (filename, "wb");
00029 
00030     fprintf (ppmfile, "P6\n%d %d\n255\n", width, height);
00031     unsigned int stepSize=3 * width;
00032     for (int i=0; i<height; i++)
00033         fwrite (&buf[i*stepSize], 3 * width, 1, ppmfile);
00034 
00035     flushall();
00036     fclose(ppmfile);
00037 }

00039 std::queue<wstring> ListDirectoryContents(const wchar_t *sDir)
00040 { 
00041     std::queue<wstring> fileQueue;
00042 
00043     WIN32_FIND_DATA fdFile; 
00044     HANDLE hFind = NULL; 
00045 
00046     wchar_t sPath[2048]; 
00047 
00048     //Specify a file mask. *.* = We want everything! 
00049     wsprintf(sPath, L"%s\\*.jpg", sDir); 
00050 
00051     if((hFind = FindFirstFile(sPath, &fdFile)) == INVALID_HANDLE_VALUE) 
00052     { 
00053         wprintf(L"Path not found: [%s]\n", sDir); 
00054         return fileQueue; 
00055     } 
00056     do
00057     {
00058         if(wcscmp(fdFile.cFileName, L".") != 0
00059             && wcscmp(fdFile.cFileName, L"..") != 0) 
00060         { 
00061             wsprintf(sPath, L"%s\\%s", sDir, fdFile.cFileName); 
00062             { 
00063                 wstring fileName(sPath);
00064                 fileQueue.push(fileName);
00065 
00066             } 
00067         }
00068     } 
00069     while(FindNextFile(hFind, &fdFile)); //Find the next file. 
00070 
00071     FindClose(hFind); //Always, Always, clean things up! 
00072 
00073     return fileQueue; 
00074 } 
00075 
00076 std::queue<wstring> ListDirectoryContentsFileNameShort(const wchar_t *sDir)
00077 { 
00078     std::queue<wstring> fileQueue;
00079 
00080     WIN32_FIND_DATA fdFile; 
00081     HANDLE hFind = NULL; 
00082 
00083     wchar_t sPath[2048]; 
00084 
00085     //Specify a file mask. *.* = We want everything! 
00086     wsprintf(sPath, L"%s\\*.jpg", sDir); 
00087 
00088     if((hFind = FindFirstFile(sPath, &fdFile)) == INVALID_HANDLE_VALUE) 
00089     { 
00090         wprintf(L"Path not found: [%s]\n", sDir); 
00091         return fileQueue; 
00092     } 
00093     do
00094     {
00095         if(wcscmp(fdFile.cFileName, L".") != 0
00096             && wcscmp(fdFile.cFileName, L"..") != 0) 
00097         {
00098             wstring fileName(fdFile.cFileName);
00099             unsigned int found = fileName.find(L".");
00100             wstring fnameShort = fileName.substr(0,found);
00101             fileQueue.push(fnameShort);
00102 
00103         } 
00104     }
00105 
00106     while(FindNextFile(hFind, &fdFile)); //Find the next file. 
00107 
00108     FindClose(hFind); //Always, Always, clean things up! 
00109 
00110     return fileQueue; 
00111 }

00114 class CTimer
00115 {
00116 public:
00117     enum units
00118     {
00119         sec, msec, usec
00120     };
00121 
00122     CTimer(void);
00123     virtual ~CTimer(void);

00130     void LowerPriority();
00131

00136     LARGE_INTEGER m_t0;

00140 CTimer::CTimer(void)
00141 {
00142     m_freq.QuadPart = 0;
00143     m_t0.QuadPart = 0;
00144     m_t1.QuadPart = 0;
00145     QueryPerformanceFrequency(&m_freq);
00146     return;
00147 }

00151 {
00152     return;
00153 }

00156 void CTimer::Init(void)
00157 {
00158 
00159     QueryPerformanceFrequency(&m_freq);
00160     return;
00161 } 
00162 
00163 
00164 void CTimer::Start(void)
00165 {
00166     QueryPerformanceCounter(&m_t0);
00167 
00168     return;
00169 } 
00170 
00171 
00172 void CTimer::Stop(void)
00173 {
00174     QueryPerformanceCounter(&m_t1);
00175     return;
00176 }

00178 
00179 void CTimer::RaisePriority(void)
00180 {
00181     SetThreadPriority(GetCurrentThread(),THREAD_PRIORITY_TIME_CRITICAL);
00182     Sleep(0);
00183 
00184     return;
00185 } // CTimer::RaisePriority()
00186 
00187 
00188 void CTimer::LowerPriority(void)
00189 {
00190     SetThreadPriority(GetCurrentThread(),THREAD_PRIORITY_NORMAL);
00191 
00192     return;
00193 } // CTimer::LowerPriority()
00194 
00195 double CTimer::GetTime(CTimer::units u)
00196 {
00197     double t;
00198 
00199     t = (double)(m_t1.QuadPart - m_t0.QuadPart) / m_freq.QuadPart;
00200 
00201     return t;
00202 }
